Description : Open a time portal and send their characters to the most extraordinary destinations : a whole new world of the future, from which we are separated hundreds of years!
    During their stay in it your characters will be able to develop your skill advanced technology to make the maximum use of technology of the future.
    Your characters will open up a whole new world of experimentation and research , which can be cut by a flying board or a jetpack , or monorail to travel or try truboliftom attractive futuristic hairstyles and outfits. Create and add personality traits plambotam by the action Create a bot , add it to the luggage and program their behavior by means of chips character!
    Navigate between the present and the future when you want, and experiment with how your characters' actions in the present affect their own future , their descendants, and even the lifestyle of the characters of the future!
